vsParam:
Hey, Nelke! How's your life here?
Have you gotten used to this world?

Yeah. My classmates treat me well,
and the teachers' lessons are very interesting...

I am very eager to know this world better and deeper.
I want to do so many things!

Ho ho. Your thirst for knowledge is as strong
as those who study relicology like myself!

You flatter me. I just have a strong curiosity. And I feel
that there's something here that only I can do...

Ha ha, you are just like students of relicology!
There are many such students in other disciplines too.

Yes. If you want to know something,
just ask us.

Really!? Thank you so much...
Actually, I want to talk a walk outside the Academy.

I have to understand the situations here
before I can decide what I might be capable of.

Got it! In this case, let us be your guides! There are
monsters out there, it's unsafe for you to go alone.

Thank you!
Ho ho, I am very look forward to it!

This is the entrance of the "Lost Woods"!
It is said that once you enter... you'll never come out!
Uh——!? Wouldn't it be very dangerous...

Peppermint,
How can you scare her like that!

It's easy to get lost here because of the tricky roads.
Teachers would bring their students here for lessons.

But, having lessons in the woods? What would it be
like... I also want to take such a lesson!

Here's the White Lotus Pool!
It's a good place for outings and playing with water!

... And occasionally you would see a few students
skipping classes here.

Ho ho, this is also a joy of student life.
What a beautiful place. And the lotus smell so good...
Let's bring some bentos here next time!

Wow... It feels like going back to school days!
We must do it next time!
We are here! This is the Ruhuna Village!

I'd recommend apples here to you!
Apples here are sweet and delicious! Taste it!

Uh... Ah, it's so good! Er~!
This place is also surrounded by trees and light breeze.

This land and the village here...
Resemble the Westbald Village.

Westbald Village...
You are the Administrator of it, right?
Resembles here... So it produces delicious apples too?

Although it's not big, Westbald is a peaceful
and quiet place like here.

Ah, no. I can't tell the resemblance...
If I must say one, I'd say that it gives me a similar feeling.

Westbald is developed from
a small village like this one.

So it means,
the village got bigger under your efforts, right?

Ho ho, thanks to the villagers' assistance.
What I did was to make requests.

People there are very kind,
and just like this place, they are also blessed by nature...

Although it's no match for a metropolis,
it's already a very beautiful place!

Nelke... Ho ho, looks like you really love
the Westbald Village.

I believe the villagers also see you
as an outstanding leader.

Exactly. It must be an amazing place.
You just ignited my passion for going there!

Thank you.
I am glad to hear that!

Thank you for taking me to visit the Lost Woods and
the White Lotus Pool... And such an amazing village.

I feel closer to this world.
This is really a good place!
